text: Hey everyone, in a Form (from cms-components) inside an Island, could we send data to the inputs/properties in HubSpot? My use case is that I would like to send an image and some numbers in hidden fields once a user submits the form.
Can anyone help me with this, that happens when I start with --storybook

Now it’s working for me on my machine :partying_face:
Thanks for it <@U07JJ8MCCK0> :rocket:
